text: Samsoni nakalonga, “Leka heni mbagame na Wafilisti wano.” Nakajikundujiza mizengo kwa mong'ho wa heye weng'ha, yila ng'handa naiwagwila wala wakulu na wanhu weng'ha wawele mgati mwake. Wanhu wabagame mhela wa kubagama kwa Samsoni, nawali wenji kusinda wala yawakopole mhela Samsoni woyawele mkomu.
